statement: sample_count and evidence_cap are currently embedded in experiment.config.scoring_stage and directly govern evidence binding and scoring sample creation.
rationale: Core schema defines both fields in ScoringStageConfig; bindExperimentEvidence and scoring seed workflows read them directly.
keyAssumptions: No alternative override path exists for counts outside experiment config.
validationCriteria: Trace all uses of sample_count/evidence_cap and confirm they read experiment.config.scoring_stage.
critiquePoints: There may be hidden overrides in lab or CLI paths not yet checked.
questions: Are there any run-level overrides already supported?
